perfumes.title: Dior Les Parfums
perfumes.description: Dior's Les Parfums collection includes a range of sophisticated and elegant fragrances, each showcasing a different facet of femininity or masculinity.

perfumes.title: Maison Francis Kurkdjian Oud Collection
perfumes.description: This collection by Francis Kurkdjian features fragrances centered around the exotic and luxurious note of oud.

perfumes.title: Jo Malone London Cologne Intense Collection
perfumes.description: Jo Malone's Cologne Intense collection offers a more concentrated and luxurious take on their signature scents.

perfumes.title: By Kilian L'Oeuvre Noire Collection
perfumes.description: By Kilian's L'Oeuvre Noire collection explores dark and sensual fragrances with a touch of mystery.

perfumes.title: Gucci Memoire d'Une Odeur Collection
perfumes.description: Gucci's Memoire d'Une Odeur collection offers a range of gender-neutral fragrances inspired by memories and emotions.

perfumes.title: Maison Margiela Replica Fantasies Collection
perfumes.description: Maison Margiela's Replica Fantasies collection recreates imaginary scents and dreams from different eras and places.

perfumes.title: Viktor & Rolf Spicebomb Collection
perfumes.description: The Spicebomb collection by Viktor & Rolf features bold and spicy fragrances with a masculine edge.

perfumes.title: Tom Ford Neroli Portofino Collection
perfumes.description: Tom Ford's Neroli Portofino collection captures the essence of the Italian Riviera with fresh and citrusy scents.

perfumes.title: Hermes Les Jardins Collection
perfumes.description: Hermes Les Jardins collection draws inspiration from various gardens around the world, offering fresh and green fragrances.

perfumes.title: Maison Lancôme Collection
perfumes.description: Lancôme's Maison Lancôme collection includes a range of elegant and sophisticated fragrances.

perfumes.title: Yves Saint Laurent (YSL) Oriental Collection
perfumes.description: YSL's Oriental Collection features rich and opulent fragrances with oriental and exotic notes.

perfumes.title: Creed Les Royales Exclusives
perfumes.description: Creed's Les Royales Exclusives collection offers luxurious and refined scents fit for royalty.

perfumes.title: Prada La Femme & L'Homme Collection
perfumes.description: Prada's La Femme and L'Homme collection provides a complementary duo of fragrances for women and men.

perfumes.title: Acqua di Parma Note di Colonia Collection
perfumes.description: Note di Colonia by Acqua di Parma explores different facets of the classic cologne.

perfumes.title: Chloe Signature Collection
perfumes.description: Chloe's Signature Collection features elegant and feminine fragrances with a modern touch.
